text: The group awarded $35,745 in scholarships in 2015. That fell to $17,078 in '17. Management expenses shot up from $855 to $109,915 — driven by $80K in "miscellaneous" expenses for its fundraising gala in 2017. There is no indication in the paperwork what those expenses were.

text: .@catoxenberg says that her daughter is now out of #NXIVM and back at home - or was until the house burned down in the Malibu fire. (This is real Book of Job stuff for parents.)
author: CaseySeiler

text: Bouchey says political insiders including Roger Stone were brought in to buff #NXIVM’s image and connect it to the powerful. Former @NYSenate GOP Majority Leader Joe Bruno was assiduously cultivated by the Bronfman sisters.
author: CaseySeiler

text: Bouchey says not everyone within #NXIVM had bad intent or were aware of alleged abuse; analogizes situation to crisis of sexual abuse of children within the Catholic Church.
author: CaseySeiler

text: Former #NXIVM board member and Keith Raniere girlfriend Barbara Bouchey on group’s appeal: “17K people came through the door, and they didn’t come through the door because they wanted to drink @koolaid or be in a cult.”
author: CaseySeiler

text: .@catoxenberg says the arrest of Allison Mack began the process that led to her daughter’s break with #NXIVM and reconciliation with her family.
author: CaseySeiler

text:
.@catoxenberg describes the moment her daughter admitted she had been branded as part of her membership in a secret sorority within #NXIVM, and that it had been “character-building.”

“I knew I’d lost her,” she said.
